Flavor Text: Unassuming but determined pests.
The first drop calls for more.
Empty now, but waiting to be filled.
The brood is eager to be taken.
All that remains is the taking.
Small, frail, but ever so useful.
What purpose could it serve?
Small, frail, and pathetic... for now.
It's hard to call it cowardly...
A very big home for a very small pest.
A friend-shaped regenerator.
Nonthreatening, if you leave it be.
A fatal illness, bound to be released.
Seemingly lazy, but ever watchful.
Carved by an unknown architect.
Tiny, scuttling, but resilient stature.
An energetic little fish.
Young, ambitious, and scared.
High speeds, and good hunting skills.

A predator, surprisingly resilient.
A pest alone, but devastating in swarm.

A slight incarnation of terror.
Curious...
Blind, but seemingly omnipresent.

Unsettling...

An ornery, ever-annoying rodent.

Out for more then it can chew.
No less conniving in incubation.
It makes its own electrical surges.
A little, but strong insect.
It only seems harmless at first glance.
Elusive, but not very menacing.

It is trying to evade death at any cost.

Meek and feeble, yes, but ever so useful.
An odd, almost unnatural behavior.

A minor problem... if not ignored.

Interesting...
A fiercely loyal companion.
Confounding...

Sharpens its' teeth on scrounged bones.
Hearty of form, but flighty of nature.
Where there is one, another is not far.
A skittish, but cunning predator.
Strange...
A violently efficient bird of prey.
A steed without its rider.
Sacrifices must be made.
An ample source of food.
A frail turtle, protected by its shell.
What an odd use...
Lots of limbs for snatching your hopes.
Flightless, yes, but mobile despite it.
Vicious pack-hunters of the rivers.

Way too territorial to allow you in.

Expectedly slippery. Surprisingly strong.

An army waiting to be provoked.
Strange, further observation is needed.

A proud and ferocious contender.

A massive stomach for a big appetite.

Go fish.
Its form speaks enough of its efficacy.

Not as cowardly as you'd believe.

Just a little guy.
Does your mouth not water at the sight?
Always on the lookout.
Resourceful, weak, but endearing.

A certified web designer.
A minor, meddlesome terror.
A meager but dangerous scavenger.

Determined to inflict its aggression.
Cradling life in fragile wings.
A venerable leader, emboldening others.
Always inevitable, emerging from death.

Flavor Text: Deadly for the clumsy travelers.

Confounding...

Vicious in looks, but frail in nature.

Curious...
An unyielding, ultimate defense.

Unsettling...
How can...

They never stay dead for long.
Frozen in time, waiting for freedom.
Repugnant...
They leave nothing behind their wake.

Problems keep on clinging to you.
Willing to dig what needs to be dug.
He'll leave the bones for you to take.
Battered and withered, but still guarding.
It is on the verge of burning out.

Rather happy, despite the crying.

The thrill of dying simply wasn't enough.
Mourning the recently departed.
Loyally protecting their pharaoh's tomb.

Yearning to quench their bloodthirst.
Naught but a corpse, left to rot.

No rest, for the dead and the living.

Not quite a blaze of glory.

A bringer of illness, a siphon of life.

They just want to find their own grave.

An invisible wall blocks the way.
Not quite a "Lightbulb" moment.
They are feeling lucky.
Nothing you do shall go unpunished.

Their numbers grow with their infection.
They lived together, they died together.
Fleeting and soon to be laid to rest.

Some are forced to scavenge the graves.
Remains of a spirit, quick to expand.
Sewn together, friends forever.

A bloodsucking prowler of the night.
Wherever they travel, death follows.

Grotesque boils, ready to burst.
A legionnaire in life, a soldier beyond.
A spiteful visage of what once was.

Forever cursed eternally in death.

Ever loyal, even beyond the grave.

A monster in life, a monster in death.

Boo!
Still fighting in the afterlife.
